channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump extends control over Washington by taking management of Union Station away from Amtrak
item.description: Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy says his department is taking management of Washington’s main transportation hub away from Amtrak, in another example of how the federal government is exerting its power over the nation’s capital.

item.title: Handling crime a strength for Trump as many in US see a ‘major problem’ in big cities: AP-NORC poll
Kilmar Abrego Garcia’s lawyers say he wants to seek asylum in the US
